title: Recycling Bins
drescaption: Offer a variety of recycling bins and containers for different materials such as paper, plastic, glass, and metal.

title: Compost Bins
drescaption: Sell compost bins for organic waste, encouraging customers to compost their kitchen scraps.

title: Reusable Bags
drescaption: Offer reusable shopping bags, reducing the need for single-use plastic bags.

title: Zero-Waste Kits
drescaption: Offer zero-waste starter kits containing reusable items like bamboo utensils, stainless steel straws, and cloth napkins.

title: Eco-Friendly Cleaning Products
drescaption: Sell environmentally friendly cleaning products, such as biodegradable soaps and reusable cleaning cloths.

title: Plastic Shredders
drescaption: Small-scale shredders for individuals to process plastic waste at home, turning items like plastic bottles into smaller pieces for recycling or crafting.
